summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI IDE Platform. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all endpoints working correctly. Frontend loads successfully with welcome screen, project creation, file explorer, Monaco editor, and all sidebar panels working. Terminal and AI Assistant are present but need deeper integration testing.

integration_issues.issue: AI Assistant input field not immediately accessible through standard navigation
Terminal input field present but needs verification of command execution integration

passed_tests: AI query API with simulated responses
Sidebar panel navigation (Explorer, Git, Extensions, Settings)
Status bar with git branch and cursor position
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI navigation improvements needed for AI Assistant and Terminal panels. Consider adding more prominent access buttons or ensuring panels are properly opened by default when features are accessed.
